So my gamed bugged and wouldn't let me place any maneuver nodes. I reloaded the game and was surprised to find my ship was now held together by magic after being sawed in half.

![21EE2725B345D92081972C4246004BC81510ED48](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45378781452715178/21EE2725B345D92081972C4246004BC81510ED48/)

Everything worked fine and the mission finished with no troubles.

![B37D650A5408F8CED547973327ADAFED2D7B06BE](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45378781455278764/B37D650A5408F8CED547973327ADAFED2D7B06BE/)

The little fairing under the heat shield disappeared. Never had it happen before, or since.
It's a known bug with the heat shield fairing, it's harmless, the manoeuvre node issue is interesting though, can you reproduce it?
